parameters.name: PERSISTENT_VOLUME_NAME
parameters.description: The name of the persistent volume associated with the deployment.

parameters.name: PERSISTENT_VOLUME_SIZE
parameters.description: The size of the persistent volume , e.g. 512Mi, 1Gi, 2Gi.

parameters.name: PERSISTENT_VOLUME_CLASS
parameters.description: The class of the volume; gluster-file, gluster-block, gluster-file-db, nfs-backup.  nfs-backup requires some manual configuration; https://github.com/BCDevOps/provision-nfs-apb
